response.job_title: Chemical Engineer | Process Engineer | Oil & Gas | Project Management
response.summary:
Young and Eager Chemical engineer. With experience in R&D, process analysis, projects, quality and customer acquisition/maintenance in the Oil & Gas, Elastomers and Food industries. 

I enjoy new challenges at work, always trying to create, optimize and bring new solutions. Wide experience dealing with different cultures. Results oriented.
response.skills: Food and Beverage Operations, Computer-Aided Design (CAD), Piping and Instrumentation Drawing (P&ID), process flow diagram (PFD), Adobe Illustrator, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Word, Aspen HYSYS, Aspen Plus, English, Engineering, Chemical Engineering, Spanish, Microsoft Office, Process Engineering, Chemical Process Engineering, Process Design, Equipment Sizing, Process Simulation, Reaction Engineering

profile_positions.description:
Investigación y desarrollo (I+D): Revisión bibliográfica, diseño de pruebas y procedimientos, creación de cronogramas y propuestas de proyectos, elaboración de pruebas de laboratorio, seguimiento de resultados a laboratorios externos, elaboración de informes (Internos y a clientes).

Ventas: Búsqueda de clientes nuevos en lineas de negocio establecidas, contacto y distribución de muestras a clientes potenciales, seguimiento de relaciones con clientes, solución de inconvenientes técnicos, apoyo a creación de nuevas lineas de producto a clientes, acompañamiento y traducción a proveedores externos.
profile_positions.title: Technical Support Engineer

profile_positions.description: Calidad: Elaboración de auditorias internas de proceso, producto y configuración. Elaboración de informes a la alta gerencia. Presentación de sugerencias de mejora.
profile_positions.title: Quality Manager

company.name: Mechero Energy
company.description:
We are an energy company that develops innovative energy-conversion solutions. Mechero aims to help reduce the planet’s contamination and increase efficiency around natural resource utilization.

Our history began at MIT, along with 17 years developing power generation projects in emerging markets which add-up to more than 400 installed MW’s using various types of fuel.

In 2008 a recurrent problem was detected: companies were facing fuel supply restrictions for their energy conversion needs.

Fuel feedstock was not always close to where it was needed, which increased costs and usually would stop projects from being developed.

That is how Mechero Energy began as a project to promote low-cost, reliable, fuel-supply solutions for power generation markets.

Since then, this Project became a new venture, focused in developing integral solutions for:

-Liquefied Natural Gas Solutions (LNG)
-Natural Gas Treatment Plants
-Associated Gas Liquid Recovery Plants (NGL)
-Power Generation

We are a dynamic, passionate team focused in coming up with the best way around any opportunity and, through innovation, defy traditional energy transformation schemes.

We aim for a future where energy transformation innovations have a significant positive impact on the quality of life of the local communities where we are present.
